description: Lists the Amazon Q Apps owned by or associated with the user either because they created it or because they used it from the library in the past. The user identity is extracted from the credentials used to invoke this operation..

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

nested_items.name: apps
nested_items.description: The list of Amazon Q Apps meeting the request criteria.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Q App.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Q App.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title of the Q App.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the Q App.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the user's association with the Q App was created.

nested_items.name: canEdit
nested_items.description: A flag indicating whether the user can edit the Q App.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the user's association with the Q App.

nested_items.name: isVerified
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Q App has been verified.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to request the next page of results.
